name: ECM + AEM UEGO Logging
description: Log from Lotus ECM and AEM X-Series UEGO wideband simultaneously. ECM provides engine data, UEGO provides precise lambda/AFR readings.

requests.name: Core Engine Data
requests.description: Engine speed, timing advance, throttle position, load_abs

requests.name: Wideband Lambda
requests.description: AEM X-Series wideband O2 sensor lambda reading
